name: Super Bowling (itch)
description:
Rules:

1. Move the ball horizontally with left and right arrows. To set the position press Space.

2. After the ball's position is set, the precision bar will appear. At the bottom an arrow will move horizontally back and forth. Press Space to stop it. The posicion in which it stops will determine de direction where the ball is going to be thrown.

3. After the precision is set, the power bar will appear. It fills back and forth. Press Space to stop it. Then the ball is thrown with the force depending on how much filled was the bar when it is stopped.
